groundcontrol.consumers.Misc Class Reference

Deals with all other interactions between client and server. More...

Public Member Functions

def __init__ (self)
 Initializes globally required variables from redis cache and other data structures that are helpful in tracking messages when the instance of this class is called in a multiprocess setting (or with multiple workers).

 Accepts request and establishes a connection with client. More...
 
def disconnect (self, message)
 Accepts disconnection message and disconnects with client. More...
 
def getMisc (self, message)
